text: I sredi nikh takiye yest', Kto (lish' pritvorno) slushayet tebya, - Na ikh serdtsa pokrov My nalozhili, Chtoby oni ne ponyali yego, I glukhotoy zakryli ushi. I dazhe yesli vse znameniya oni uvidyat, V nikh ne uveruyut oni. Kogda zh k tebe oni pridut, To stanut prepirat'sya, govorya: "Siye - lish' tol'ko skazy pervykh
